content:
- [x] Standard error types implemented (see `pkg/errors/types.go`)
- [x] Error codes defined for all modules (`pkg/errors/codes.go`)
- [x] Error wrapping framework complete (`pkg/errors/wrapping.go`)
- [x] gRPC error integration functional (`pkg/errors/grpc.go`)
- [x] Module-specific error handling implemented (`pkg/errors/types.go`)
- [x] Error reporting system working (`pkg/errors/reporter.go`)
- [x] Comprehensive error tests complete (`pkg/errors/types_test.go`)
- [x] Error documentation complete
